event.title: SWmobile: September meetup
event.description:
Come join us for 3 excellent talks and a chance to chat and mix with fellow mobile peoples from the local area and beyond. Oh and the pizza and beer! 

Talks:

•  Eifion Jones - Lean Video: How to make an app promo on a budget

•  Tom  Melamed - Passwords suck! - there must be a better way?

• QA session - ask your questions here

Format as usual... 

1830 pizza arrive. People should try to arrive around then

1900 the front doors to the office are closed/locked. No one can now enter the lobby or the alarms go off.

~2100 talks wrap up, room is tidy and put back like it was. Everyone leaves via the carpark.
